Uses of Interface
fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.http.IContentType

  • Packages that use IContentType 
    Package Description
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.http
    Services for handling HTTP communications, including management of the embedded web server.

    • Uses of IContentType in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.http

      Methods in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.http that return IContentType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IContentType IHttpServiceCall.createContentType(IMediaType mediaType, Charset charset)
      Converts a MIME-type string into an immutable structured content type, with a charset suffix.
      IContentType IHttpServiceCall.createContentType(String contentType)
      Converts a MIME-type string, with an optional charset suffix, into an immutable structured content type.
      IContentType IHttpServiceCall.createContentType(String mediaType, String charset)
      Converts a MIME-type string into an immutable structured content type, with a charset suffix.
      IContentType IFormPart.getContentType()
      Gets the content type of the file, if known.
      IContentType IHttpService.getFileContentType(CharSequence fileName)
      Where possible, gets a value for a HTTP Content-Type header based on a given filename (based on known filename extension mappings), including (where relevant) character set information.
      IContentType IHttpService.getFileContentType(CharSequence fileName, String charset)
      Where possible, gets a value for a HTTP Content-Type header based on a given filename (based on known filename extension mappings), including character set information.
      Methods in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.http with parameters of type IContentType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OutputStream IHttpServiceCall.getResponseStream(CharSequence downloadFileName, IContentType downloadContentType)
      Gets a binary output stream to build the HTTP response as a file download, using the specified name and content type.
      BufferedWriter IHttpServiceCall.getResponseWriter(CharSequence downloadFileName, IContentType downloadContentType)
      Gets a text output writer to build the HTTP response as a file download, using the specified name and content type.
      void IHttpServiceCall.setContentType(IContentType contentType)
      Sets the HTTP Content-Type header value.
